name: Tetris (itch) (doombringer_azurai)
description:
A simple tetris game made using pygame library.

Requirements to run the game:
  • python - 3.10
  • pip
  • pygame - 2.1.2
Controls
  •  space: hard drop
  •  a: lock tetromino
  • h: left
  • l: right
  • j: down (soft drop)
  • z: rotate left
  • x: rotate right
  • k: rotate 180
  • c: swap tetromino
